column5: Going to a lake in Ontario the end of march to target trophy northern. Looking for a few tips on location/presentation and what to be looking for. Thanks in advance.
The end of March????Advice.....bring an ice auger!!

Six to nine inch Portugese sardines on a quick strike rig on a tip upCan't miss with this combination in March. The pike are starting to bite now. Pulled a couple of 30 inchers out on Sunday. Expecting bigger ones this weekend.Good luck.Le picPS 15 to 20 feet of water or shallower
